Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected result: The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Sepolia.

Test steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Switch to the wallet and open the activity list item.
Expected result: The contract deployment transaction status, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.

Test steps: In the test dapp, proceed to approve tokens.
Expected result: Spending cap request notification window is shown. The token icon and symbol TST are shown. An input field is displayed, allow user to edit the spending cap amount .

Test steps: Proceed to approve the spending cap request.

Expected result: The transaction "Approve TST spending cap" appears in the activity list.
The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.
The created, submitted and confirmed activity are shown in the activity log.

Test steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
